Symbol.Script_3D:
!hotspot 0,0,0:sphere .01:lin_ 0,0,0,1,0,0:lin_ 0,0,0,0,.5,0:lin_ 0,0,0,0,0,2
if iPatternStartDisplayed = SHOW_PATTERN_NO \ !!| isHorizontal \ then end
if isHorizontal then aVertical = -90 endif
HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID : unID=unID+1
addy -0.01
m=xArrow[4]-nx if m < -kd/2 + EPS then m = 3 * kd/2 n=xArrow[1]-nx if n < -kd/2 + EPS then n = 3 * kd/2
if GLOB_VIEW_TYPE <> 4 \ & GLOB_VIEW_TYPE <> 5 \ then HOTSPOT 0, 0, 1, unID, aVertical, 4+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -sin(aVertical)*m, cos(aVertical)*m, unID, aVertical, 5 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, aVertical, 6 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 1, 0, 0, unID, aVertical, 7 : unID=unID+1 endif
rotx 90 + aVertical HOTSPOT 1, 0, 0, unID, aHorizontal, 4+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT cos(aHorizontal)*n, sin(aHorizontal)*n, 0, unID, aHorizontal, 5 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, aHorizontal, 6 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 1, unID, aHorizontal, 7 : unID=unID+1
rotz aHorizontal if hasStarter then HOTSPOT 0, yStarter, 0, unID, xStarterLeft, 1 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -xStarterLeft, yStarter, 0, unID, xStarterLeft, 2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 1, yStarter, 0, unID, xStarterLeft, 3 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0, yStarter, 0, unID, xStarterRight, 1 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT xStarterRight, yStarter, 0, unID, xStarterRight, 2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1, yStarter, 0, unID, xStarterRight, 3 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT -xStarterLeft, 0, 0, unID, yStarter, 1 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -xStarterLeft, yStarter, 0, unID, yStarter, 2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -xStarterLeft, -1, 0, unID, yStarter, 3 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT xStarterRight, 0, 0, unID, yStarter, 1 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT xStarterRight, yStarter, 0, unID, yStarter, 2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT xStarterRight, -1, 0, unID, yStarter, 3 : unID=unID+1
put \ -xStarterLeft, yStarter, 1, xStarterRight, yStarter, 1, xStarterRight, yRight, 1, -xStarterLeft, 0, 1
material sStarter
POLY_ nsp/3, get(nsp) addz 0.001 endif
material sSurface
circle kd/2
FOR jj=1 TO vardim1(xArrow) HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, xArrow[jj], 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT xArrow[jj], 0, 0, unID, xArrow[jj], 2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1, 0, 0, unID, xArrow[jj], 3 : unID=unID+1
IF xArrow[jj] > kd/2 + EPS THEN LIN_ kd/2, 0, 0, xArrow[jj]-nx, 0, 0
ADD xArrow[jj], 0, 0 POLY 3, 0, 0, -nx, ny/2, -nx, -ny/2 DEL 1 ENDIF ROTZ -90 NEXT jj del 1 del 1
Symbol.Script_2D:
if not(isHorizontal) \ & ( iPatternStartDisplayed = SHOW_PATTERN_NO \ | iPatternStartDisplayed = SHOW_PATTERN_3D) \ then end
if hasStarter then HOTSPOT2 0, yStarter, unID, xStarterLeft, 1 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -xStarterLeft, yStarter, unID, xStarterLeft, 2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 1, yStarter, unID, xStarterLeft, 3 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 0, yStarter, unID, xStarterRight, 1 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 xStarterRight, yStarter, unID, xStarterRight, 2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, yStarter, unID, xStarterRight, 3 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 -xStarterLeft, 0, unID, yStarter, 1 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -xStarterLeft, yStarter, unID, yStarter, 2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -xStarterLeft, -1, unID, yStarter, 3 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 xStarterRight, 0, unID, yStarter, 1 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 xStarterRight, yStarter, unID, yStarter, 2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 xStarterRight, -1, unID, yStarter, 3 : unID=unID+1
put \ -xStarterLeft, yStarter, 1, xStarterRight, yStarter, 1, xStarterRight, 0, 1, -xStarterLeft, 0, 1
fill fStarter
POLY2_B nsp/3, 1+2+4, pStarterFg, pStarterBg, get(nsp) endif
DIM dd[][] pen toll fill kit line_type vonal
put 0, 0, 900, kd/2, 360, 4001 POLY2_B nsp/3, 1+2+4, kit_toll, kit_hatt, get (nsp)
HOTSPOT2 0, 0
IF lay THEN MUL2 1/(laym*1000), 1/(laym*1000)
FOR jj=1 TO vardim1(xArrow) if isHorizontal or jj % 2 then l=1 else l=0.2 m = (xArrow[jj]-kd/2-nx)*l+kd/2+nx
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, xArrow[jj], 1 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 m, 0, unID, xArrow[jj], 2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, 0, unID, xArrow[jj], 3 : unID=unID+1
IF xArrow[jj] > kd/2 + EPS THEN LINE2 kd/2, 0, m-nx, 0
ADD2 m, 0 POLY2_B 3, 1+2+4, kit_toll, kit_hatt, 0, 0, 1, -nx, ny/2, 1, -nx, -ny/2, 1 DEL 1 ENDIF
ROT2 -90 NEXT jj
Symbol.Script_1D:
! iPatternStartDisplayed SHOW_PATTERN_NO = 0 SHOW_PATTERN_3D = 1 SHOW_PATTERN_ALWAYS = 2
EPS = 0.1
unID = 0
typ1n = (typ1="Kör") typ2n = (typ2="Tompa") + (typ2="Feles")*2 + (typ2="Hegyes")*3
nx = ny*((typ2n=1)/2 + (typ2n=2) + (typ2n=3)*2) : ! ***** NYÍLHEGY HOSSZA
success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("LIMA_SymbSettings", "iPatternStartDisplayed", temp_iPatternStartDisplayed)
if success > 0 then iPatternStartDisplayed = temp_iPatternStartDisplayed
rK = kd / 2
Symbol.Script_VL:
VALUES "typ1" "Kör" VALUES "typ2" "Tompa", "Feles", "Hegyes" values "xStarterRight" range [0,] values "xStarterLeft" range [0,]
IF kfix THEN VALUES "xArrow" kd/2, kf else hideparameter "kf" ENDIF
if not(hasStarter) then hideparameter "xStarterLeft", "xStarterRight", "yStarter", "pStarterFg", "pStarterBg", "fStarter", "sStarter" endif
for i = 1 to vardim1(xArrow) IF xArrow[i] < kd/2 + EPS THEN xArrow[i] = kd/2 next i
PARAMETERS xArrow=xArrow
